entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
